function.arguments: {"command": "insert", "path": "/workspace/benchmark/datasets/6-RepE/representation-engineering-main/unit_test/unit_test_1.py", "insert_line": 68, "new_str": "# initialize H_train_means if not already\\n    if not hasattr(self, 'H_train_means'):\\n        self.H_train_means = {}\\n    # compute PCA components for each specified layer\\n    for layer in hidden_layers:\\n        H = hidden_states[layer]\\n        b, s, d = H.shape\\n        H_np = H.detach().cpu().numpy().reshape(-1, d)\\n        # store and reuse mean for centering\\n        if layer not in self.H_train_means:\\n            self.H_train_means[layer] = H_np.mean(axis=0)\\n        X_centered = H_np - self.H_train_means[layer]\\n        # fit PCA and take first principal component\\n        pca = PCA(n_components=self.n_components)\\n        pca.fit(X_centered)\\n        directions[layer] = pca.components_[0]\\n"}
function.name: str_replace_editor

args.new_str:
# initialize H_train_means if not already
    if not hasattr(self, 'H_train_means'):
        self.H_train_means = {}
    # compute PCA components for each specified layer
    for layer in hidden_layers:
        H = hidden_states[layer]
        b, s, d = H.shape
        H_np = H.detach().cpu().numpy().reshape(-1, d)
        # store and reuse mean for centering
        if layer not in self.H_train_means:
            self.H_train_means[layer] = H_np.mean(axis=0)
        X_centered = H_np - self.H_train_means[layer]
        # fit PCA and take first principal component
        pca = PCA(n_components=self.n_components)
        pca.fit(X_centered)
        directions[layer] = pca.components_[0]
